content:
The Sicheslav paratroopers destroyed the enemy tank with the crew.

Relevant VideoPublishedCommand of landing troops of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

As stated in the message, despite the difficult situation on the front, the paratroopers will still be winners.

"We are destroying and we will continue to destroy! The enemy will not pass!" the message reads.
title: The paratroopers showed how they destroyed an enemy tank along with the crew
description: The corresponding video posted the command of the Air Force forces of the Armed Forces ...
author: Army Inform
